page.title: 16Yarm Theatre
page.content: On Saturdays we and some of our friends go to a theatrical school in Middlesbrough run by the{Charlton {Brothers.}One of our friends saw an advertisment in the paper which asked for boys between nine and thirteen years.We all decided to go and see what it was like.The first few weeks we were treated as the new kids,but after a while we were accepted into the group. We did our first performance "Junior Show Time" after five months of training.We did five performances of approximately two and a half hours each.The tickets were eighty pence for children and one pound for adults. The money paid for the hire of the stage. Any profit goes to the producer.We also had to pay one pound a week for the training.
